If $w=\cos40^\circ+i\sin40^\circ $, then
\[|w+2w^2+3w^3+ \dots +9w^9|^{-1}\]can be expressed in the form $\frac{a}{b} \sin n^\circ,$ where $a$ and $b$ are relatively prime positive integers, and $n$ is a positive integer smaller than 90.  Find $a + b + n.$

Since $w = \cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ,$ $w$ lies on the unit circle, so $|w| = 1.$  Also, by DeMoivre's Theorem,
\[w^n = \cos 40n^\circ + i \sin 40n^\circ.\]Hence,
\begin{align*}
|w + 2w^2 + 3w^3 + \dots + 9w^9| &= |(\cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ) + 2 (\cos 80^\circ + i \sin 80^\circ) + \dots + 9 (\cos 360^\circ + i \sin 360^\circ)| \\
&= \left| \left( \sum_{k = 1}^9 k \cos 40k^\circ \right) + i \left( \sum_{k = 1}^9 k \sin 40k^\circ \right) \right| \\
&= \sqrt{\left( \sum_{k = 1}^9 k \cos 40k^\circ \right)^2 + \left( \sum_{k = 1}^9 k \sin 40k^\circ \right)^2}.
\end{align*}Let
\[S = \sum_{k = 1}^9 k \cos 40k^\circ + i \sum_{k = 1}^9 k \sin 40k^\circ.\]Then
\begin{align*}
wS &= \sum_{k = 1}^9 k (\cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ)(\cos 40k^\circ + i \sin 40k^\circ) \\
&= \sum_{k = 1}^9 k (\cos 40(k + 1)^\circ + i \sin 40(k + 1)^\circ) \\
&= \sum_{k = 2}^{10} (k - 1) (\cos 40k^\circ + i \sin 40k^\circ).
\end{align*}Thus,
\[wS - S = -(\cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ) + 9 (\cos 360^\circ + i \sin 360^\circ) + 8 (\cos 400^\circ + i \sin 400^\circ) + 7 (\cos 440^\circ + i \sin 440^\circ),\]so
\[S(w - 1) = -w + 9 + 8 (\cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ) + 7 (\cos 80^\circ + i \sin 80^\circ).\]Then
\begin{align*}
|S|^2 |w - 1|^2 &= |S(w - 1)|^2 \\
&= |-w + 9 + 8w + 7w^2|^2 \\
&= |9 + 7w + 6w^2|^2 \\
&= (9 + 7 \cos 40^\circ + 6 \cos 80^\circ)^2 + (7 \sin 40^\circ + 6 \sin 80^\circ)^2.

Let $S = w + 2w^2 + 3w^3 + \dots + 9w^9.$  Then
\[wS = w^2 + 2w^3 + 3w^4 + \dots + 9w^{10}.\]Subtracting these equations, we get
\[(1 - w) S = w + w^2 + w^3 + \dots + w^9 - 9w^{10}.\]Note that $w^9 = \cos 360^\circ + i \sin 360^\circ = 1,$ so $w^9 - 1 = 0.$  This factors as
\[(w - 1)(w^8 + w^7 + \dots + w + 1) = 0.\]Since $w \neq 1,$
\[w^8 + w^7 + \dots + w + 1 = 0.\]Hence,
\begin{align*}
(1 - w) S &= w + w^2 + w^3 + \dots + w^9 - 9w^{10} \\
&= w(1 + w + w^2 + \dots + w^8) - 9w \\
&= -9w,
\end{align*}so
\[S = -\frac{9w}{1 - w}.\]Now,
\begin{align*}
\frac{1}{1 - w} &= \frac{1}{1 - \cos 40^\circ - i \sin 40^\circ} \\
&= \frac{1 - \cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ}{(1 - \cos 40^\circ)^2 + \sin^2 40^\circ} \\
&= \frac{1 - \cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ}{2 - 2 \cos 40^\circ} \\
&= \frac{2 \sin^2 20^\circ + 2i \sin 20^\circ \cos 20^\circ}{4 \sin^2 20^\circ} \\
&= \frac{\sin 20^\circ + i \cos 20^\circ}{2 \sin 20^\circ} \\
&= \frac{\cos 70^\circ + i \sin 70^\circ}{2 \sin 20^\circ} \\
\end{align*}Then
\begin{align*}
\frac{1}{|S|} &= \left| \frac{1 - w}{9w} \right| \\
&= \frac{2 \sin 20^\circ}{9 |\cos 70^\circ + i \sin 70^\circ|} \\
&= \frac{2}{9} \sin 20^\circ.
\end{align*}The final answer is $2 + 9 + 20 = \boxed{31}.$

Let $S = w + 2w^2 + 3w^3 + \dots + 9w^9.$  Then
\[wS = w^2 + 2w^3 + 3w^4 + \dots + 9w^{10}.\]Subtracting these equations, we get
\[(1 - w) S = w + w^2 + w^3 + \dots + w^9 - 9w^{10}.\]Note that $w^9 = \cos 360^\circ + i \sin 360^\circ = 1,$ so $w^9 - 1 = 0.$  This factors as
\[(w - 1)(w^8 + w^7 + \dots + w + 1) = 0.\]Since $w \neq 1,$
\[w^8 + w^7 + \dots + w + 1 = 0.\]Hence,
\begin{align*}
(1 - w) S &= w + w^2 + w^3 + \dots + w^9 - 9w^{10} \\
&= w(1 + w + w^2 + \dots + w^8) - 9w \\
&= -9w,
\end{align*}so
\[S = -\frac{9w}{1 - w}.\]Now,
\begin{align*}
\frac{1}{1 - w} &= \frac{1}{1 - \cos 40^\circ - i \sin 40^\circ} \\
&= \frac{1 - \cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ}{(1 - \cos 40^\circ)^2 + \sin^2 40^\circ} \\
&= \frac{1 - \cos 40^\circ + i \sin 40^\circ}{2 - 2 \cos 40^\circ} \\
&= \frac{2 \sin^2 20^\circ + 2i \sin 20^\circ \cos 20^\circ}{4 \sin^2 20^\circ} \\
&= \frac{\sin 20^\circ + i \cos 20^\circ}{2 \sin 20^\circ} \\
&= \frac{\cos 70^\circ + i \sin 70^\circ}{2 \sin 20^\circ} \\
\end{align*}Then
\begin{align*}
\frac{1}{|S|} &= \left| \frac{1 - w}{9w} \right| \\
&= \frac{2 \sin 20^\circ}{9 |\cos 70^\circ + i \sin 70^\circ|} \\
&= \frac{2}{9} \sin 20^\circ.
\end{align*}The final answer is $2 + 9 + 20 = \boxed{31}.$
